metadata.title: CVE-2024-40944 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:x86/kexec: Fix bug with call depth trackingThe call to cc_platform_has() triggers a fault and system crash if calldepthtracking is active because the GS segment has been reset by load_segments()andGS_BASE is now 0 but call depth tracking uses per-CPU variables to operate.Call cc_platform_has() earlier in the function when GS is still valid.  [ bp: Massage. ]
